    • retrievePostsByUserIds

      public static java.util.LinkedHashMap<Post,​java.util.ArrayList<Comment>> retrievePostsByUserIds​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> listOfIdsToFindPostBy)
      Retreive all the Post and Comments objects made by an ArrayList of userIds
      Parameters:
      listOfIdsToFindPostBy - An ArrayList containing the userIds to find posts by
      Returns:
      A LinkHashMap of Post objects for key and ArrayList of Comment objects for value

    • display

      public static void display​(java.util.Map<Post,​java.util.ArrayList<Comment>> posts, int outsideCounter)
      Display the Post and Comment objects
      Parameters:
      posts - A Map of Post objects for key and Comment objects for value
      outsideCounter - Identify the counter to start numbering the threads from

    • retrieveThread

      public static java.util.HashMap<Post,​java.util.ArrayList<Comment>> retrieveThread​(java.util.LinkedHashMap<Post,​java.util.ArrayList<Comment>> threads, int num)
      Retreive a specific thread from the LinkedHashMap of Post and Comment objects
      Parameters:
      threads - LinkedHashMap of Post and Comment objects structured as threads
      num - thread number to retreive
      Returns:
      the specific entry within the LinkedHashMap

    • canKill

      public static void canKill​(java.util.HashMap<Post,​java.util.ArrayList<Comment>> thread, int userId)
      Checks if user has permission to kill thread and calls killThread/killPost accordingly if he/she does
      Parameters:
      thread - thread user wants to dislike
      userId - userId of user who wants to kill the thread

    • killWall

      public static void killWall​(java.util.HashMap<Post,​java.util.ArrayList<Comment>> thread, int userId)
      Removes post from user's wall
      Parameters:
      thread - thread user wants to remove
      userId - userId of user who wants to remove thread

    • killThread

      public static void killThread​(java.util.HashMap<Post,​java.util.ArrayList<Comment>> thread, int userId)
      Kills thread
      Parameters:
      thread - thread user wants to remove
      userId - userId of user who wants to remove thread
